verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: slapped] [ARG1: tariffs on China] , then reconsidered . He yanked the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal without a plan B. He ordered U.S. penalties on ZTE Corp. reversed to save Chinese jobs .
